nodes.bodyText:
SqlServer:
  id: 3006
  languages: C#

SqlServer language should be updated.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -537,4 +540,5 @@ Component-Server-Mappings:
   influxdb-java: InfluxDB
   Predis: Redis
   PyMysql: Mysql
-  spring-kafka-consumer: kafka-consumer
\ No newline at end of file
+  spring-kafka-consumer: kafka-consumer
+  mssql-jdbc-driver: SqlServer

nodes.bodyText: Why not use org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.match.MultiClassNameMatch so that you don't need several subclasses?
